name: splat! (itch) (otama studios)
description:
This is a game called splat!

simple rules, just shove people of an island :)

like 3D pacman, this one has been in development for a year, it got abandoned a year ago an never got published, but it is up on the web now! here is a little bit of story of what happend to the game.

so I was bored, and decided to make a game and came up with this!

but in the prototype it was really broken and nobody liked it  :(

so I fixed up and here we are!
